column3: Latest;Battambang: Phnom Proek District Police arrested a man for stealing solar panels and street lamps on October 2
column4: 2020 at 9:00 AM in front of Silo Sok Kanya
column7: Phnom Proek District.------District Police Inspectorate arrested one suspect
column11: residing in the village.------He is accuses of being involved in the case of theft (solar panels and light bulbs) on September 17
column16: including solar panels and two light bulbs.------Police have enough evidence and have built a case to send the suspect to the Battambang Provincial Court for legal proceedings. MCPN
